title: Workers' compensation insurance certificates
dataVerified: Employer name, coverage state, policy number, effective dates, insurer name
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake workers' comp certificates enabling uninsured employer fraud. Domain binding verifies insurer. State regulatory compliance verification. Prevents employee injury liability exposure for project owners. Uninsured employer fraud results in billions in unpaid workers' comp claims. Critical for contractors where workers' comp verification protects against liability for contractor's injured employees.
